title: Is It Too Late For Democrats to Change Their Message?
description:
After trying to frame the 2022 midterms around abortion, Democrats are trying to shift their focus to issues like crime and the economy.  But aren't Democratic policies on those issues part of the reason voters are unhappy? Plus, Joe Biden's latest gaffe about student loan forgiveness once again puts the president's role in November elections in the spotlight. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Paul Gigot, The Wall Street Journal
